item.title: César add a quote by Colin Wilson
item.description: "The body will destroy the germs of a physical illness within a week; but the mind will preserve germs of morbidity or fear for a lifetime." -- Colin Wilson

item.title: César add a quote by Colin Wilson
item.description: "Human intelligence is a function of man’s evolutionary urge; the scientist and the philosopher hunger for truth because they are tired of being merely human." -- Colin Wilson

item.title: César add a quote by Algernon Bertram Freeman-Mitford
item.description: "If a man thinks only of his own profit, and tries to benefit himself at the expense of others, he will incur the hatred of Heaven." -- Algernon Bertram Freeman-Mitford

item.title: César add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "The thing under my bed waiting to grab my ankle isn't real. I know that, and I also know that if I'm careful to keep my foot under the covers, it will never be able to grab my ankle." -- Stephen King
